metadata.name: Konny Solidarity
metadata.description:
Konny is scared and sad. He cannot imagine humans could be capable of making war on each other..

Konny is a rabbit of Rotella Circus, the first iconic character that will show itself in its various metamorphosis. Konny will make us travel in one dream dimension where animals live together, humans and seeds who, in a succession of performances and artistic actions, they will express thoughts related to the modernity, to the mysteries of the universe, love for the planet earth and ... more
